__e: Look, I'm not running a charity ward, see?
You wouldn't have to have the baby in a charity ward.
You are in the lockdown ward at St. Matthew's Charity and you are back in the city now, John.
You'd better get down to the sick bay and have another jab.
Perhaps... Perhaps you had better go to the nurse and ask for accident report blanks.
I'd like you to come to sickbay for some examinations, Captain.
We could set up another sick bay for the crew and make the prison one off-limits.
I'm aware you're under stress and I will let the matter drop if you report to sickbay for a full examination.
